name: Puzzler World 2013
overview: Over 1200 new puzzles and bonus games from the world's leading supplier of puzzle content Play the greatest variety of puzzles ever offered in a Puzzler World title Additional bonus games - Missing Piece, Symbols, Chain Letters, Colour-In, Sum-Up, Jigsaw, Hangman, Chain Letters and more! Nintendo DS Handwriting Recognition - Teach the game your own unique handwriting style Game caters for 5 language territories, English, French, Italian, German and Spanish.
